snippet.title: Shadow Warrior 3 Preview: Blending Doom, Duke Nukem, and a Samurai Sword
snippet.description:
We take a first look at Shadow Warrior 3, which focuses, Doom Eternal-style, on a story-driven single-player campaign with fast action, a grappling hook, wall-running, and jokes. Lots of jokes. Shadow Warrior 3 will be released in 2021.

#ign
